meanings.sent1: The old car was clunkier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: The broken toy sounded clunkier than before.
meanings.sent3: The clunkier noise of the door closing made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His footsteps on the creaky floor were clunkier than a drummer's beat.
meanings.sent5: The clunkier sound of the falling book echoed through the room.

meanings.definition: Awkward or unwieldy in design or construction.
meanings.sent1: The clunkier furniture was hard to move around.
meanings.sent2: Her clunkier shoes made it difficult to walk gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The clunkier robot kept bumping into walls, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The clunkier building stood out among the sleek skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The clunkier backpack weighed heavily on his shoulders as he walked.
